document_data.mainbody:
Saribel Xorlarrin, later Saribel Baenre, was a drow priestess of Lolth and a member of House Xorlarrin in the mid–15 century.
Saribel accompanied the expedition led by Ravel Xorlarrin to Gauntlgrym in the . Ravel thought her to be the youngest, weakest, and possibly stupidest of the houses priestesses. Then again, she was his sister.
In the , she accompanied Tiago Baenre to Clan Battlehammer in Icewind Dale in an assault that left many dwarves dead and others enslaved. That same year, she married Tiago, also making her part of the restored House DoUrden. She took his family name, despite it being against drow custom, because Tiago and House Baenre were more powerful than her own house. After her marriage, she led orc forces against the town of Nesmé. When the orc forces overtook Nesmé, Tiago and Saribel became the "Duke and Duchess of Nesmé."
Saribel was the daughter of Zeerith QXorlarrin.
